title: Trust Funds/Creation/Historic Cemeteries Trust Fund/Department of State
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Trust Funds/Creation/Historic Cemeteries Trust Fund/Department of State;  Creates Historic Cemeteries Trust Fund within Division of Historical Resources of DOS; provides purpose of trust fund; requires that moneys be deposited into trust fund & disbursed by division as provided in specified provision; requires that any balance at end of fiscal year remain in trust fund for specified purpose; provides for future review & termination or re-creation of trust fund.
